definition: to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Candidates can attend the test with he admission ticket issued by the testing site.
sentences.chinese: 考生持主考单位核发的“准考证”进入考场参加考试。

sentences.english: What if I did not complete my candidate number?
sentences.chinese: 如果我没有填写完整的准考证号在答题卡上怎么办？

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it also deduces and links with some other paronyms.
sentences.chinese: 同时，考证中还推论系联了其他同源词。

sentences.english: In addition, the author conducts a textual research on the location of…
sentences.chinese: 文章还对《后汉书》所述“三危”的位置进行了考证。

sentences.english: However, it is hard to research his life age due to uncertain family name.
sentences.chinese: 姓氏的不确定，也就难以考证他的生卒年。

sentences.english: The painting was ascribed to an unknown artist.
sentences.chinese: 据考证这幅画的作者是一位无名画家。

sentences.english: Still, that leaves a lot of room for fact-checking.
sentences.chinese: 不过，还有很多情况是有待考证的。

sentences.english: Whether this bronze bird was a decoration on a vessel's lid requires further investigation.
sentences.chinese: 而铜鸟是否器盖上的装饰，有待进一步考证。

sentences.english: Only researching on the mistakes of historians' records of Xiaoru's martyrdom could the historical reality be represented.
sentences.chinese: 考证史家曲笔与错误之处，才能再现孝孺殉难的真相。

sentences.english: The third part puts on emphasis on discussing the application of Wang's textual research thinking in the book.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，主要探讨王氏考证学思想在本书中的运用。

sentences.english: Researches the personages who have important influence to Liaoning vocational education in Late-Qing and Early-Republican China.
sentences.chinese: 对清末民初辽宁的实业教育有影响的人物进行了考证。

sentences.english: The first part mainly researches the family background of Zhang Zhan and his biography.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分主要考证张湛的家世及其生平。

sentences.english: Please come in person to apply and take the test pass.
sentences.chinese: 考生须本人亲自到报名处报名，领取准考证。

sentences.english: Historical textual criticism of Plumbago zeylanica L.
Thereupon this paper concludes through a textual research that it was written in the eve of the downfall of the Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本文在此说的基础上，考证《大招》作于秦亡前夕。

sentences.english: Further, the author studies the chronology of the Jin marquese in the Western Zhou period from Marquise Jing.
sentences.chinese: 进一步，还可考证出晋靖侯以降西周时期晋侯系年。

definition: to examine/to investigate/to try to determine
general history of a county/county annals
